channel.title: Npc need help!

item.title: Npc need help!
item.dc:creator: @Mollett Mollett
item.description:
@Mollett wrote:

Hey guys I added Hati to my server earlier today with the npc id: 13460 I added it by using the NPCSpawning.java.

When Hati is spawned manually through the developer console it attacks players but for some reason it doesnâ€™t when I added it to the NPCSpawning.java

I think it is also important that you know I am using Rune-Evo 718 source

This is the code I added to my NPCSpawning.java

HAITI(13460, 2702, 3626, 0, true);

Additionally, I added the following to NPC.java

if (id == 13460)
{
setRandomWalk(true);
}

Any help would be greatly appreciated!

Read full topic
